We Have Successfully Added Your Selection!
Welcome! We need some information to complete your registration. Enter your Email Please Enter your Password Sign up now!
Activity Benefit Sleep It may seem obvious that sleep is beneficial. Even without fully grasping what sleep does for us, we know that going without sleep for too long makes us feel terrible, and that getting a good night\'s sleep can make us feel ready to take on the world.
Yoga Benefits include: increased flexibility, muscle strength and tone. It also improves respiration, energy and vitality. Yoga helps to main a balanced metabolism, can aid in weight reduction, and can improve cardio and circulatory health.
Jogging Helps to build strong bones, as it is a weight bearing exercise that strengthens muscles, improve cardiovascular fitness, and burns plenty of calories/kilojoules to help maintain a healthy weight.
Running Helps to build strong bones, as it is a weight bearing exercise that strengthens muscles, improve cardiovascular fitness, and burns plenty of calories/kilojoules to help maintain a healthy weight.
Swimming Keeps your heart rate up while taking some of the impact stress off of your body. It helps to build endurance, muscle strength and cardiovascular fitness. Swimming also helps to maintain a healthy weight, healthy heart and lungs.
Cycling Consistent cycling can help build cardiovascular fitness, muscle strength and flexibility. It can also improve joint mobility and posture, while decreasing stress levels.
Record all of your health data in the app so it's all in one place Keep track of your prescriptions and appointments Log your mental and physical health, exercise, and diet Set both short term and long term goals to improve your life
